title: Tasty Goan Chicken Xacuti Recipe
content:
Super delicious Goan chicken xacuti recipe which tastes great with idli, dosa, roti. It especially goes well with Goan pao bread.

When I was looking for dinner inspiration online, I came across a picture of a spicy chicken curry served with some pav rolls. I got so inspired by that so I made it almost immediately. I served this with pav rolls.

 

Goan Chicken Xacuti Recipe

Prep time: 15 mins

Cook time: 45 mins

Total time: 1 hour

 

Recipe type: Main

Cuisine: Indian

Serves: 6 servings

 

Ingredients

Chicken - 1 kg cut into small pieces

Salt to taste

Oil - 4 tablespoons

Onion - 1 large chopped finely

 

FOR GREEN CHUTNEY:

Coriander Leaves - 1 cup

Green Chillies - 2

Lemon Juice - 2 tablespoons

 

FOR ROASTING & GRINDING:

Oil - 1 tsp + 1 teaspoon

Coconut - 1 cup grated

Garlic - 8 cloves

Ginger - 2-inch piece

Dry Red Chillies - 4 to 5

Cumin Seeds / Jeerakam - 1 teaspoon

Black Pepper - 1 teaspoon

Fennel Seeds / Sombu / Saunf - 1 teaspoon

Ajwain / Carom Seeds / Omam - 1 teaspoon

Poppy Seeds / Khus Khus / Kasa - 2 tablespoons

Cloves / Krambu - 5

Cinnamon / Pattai - 1 stick

Cardamom / Yelakai - 5

Nutmeg - ¼ teaspoon

Tamarind - 1 lemon size

Coriander Powder - 2 tablespoons

Kashmiri Chilli Powder - 2 tablespoons

Turmeric Powder - 1 teaspoon

Start Anise - 2

 

Instructions

Grind together ingredients for green chutney and set aside.

Take chicken in a bowl, add salt and green chutney and mix well. Set aside for 30 mins

Heat 1 tsp oil in a pan, add whole spices except powdered spices and coconut. Toast till lightly golden. Add in spice powders and mix well. Remove to a blender.

In the same pan add in coconut and roast till golden. Remove the blender and grind to a smooth puree.

Heat oil in a pan, add onions and cook till golden.

Add chicken and saute for 5 mins.

Add ground masala and water. Mix well.

Bring it to a boil and simmer for 30 to 40 mins till oil separates and chicken is cooked.

Remove and serve it.

recommendations.title: Tasty Chicken Egg Scramble ( Leftover ) Recipe
Tasty Chicken Lasagna Recipe
recommendations.content:
Lasagna is quite easy to make but it can feed a crowd. All you need is to make some tomato sauce and white sauce and you are good to go. You can make a huge batch of it and make multiple pans of lasagna and freeze it. You can directly bake frozen lasagna and enjoy on busy weeknights.
